attributes.action: Give the late Queen Elizabeth 11, the epithet GREAT----Elizabeth The Great.
attributes.additional_details: The late lady has without doubt contributed to the standing of this country abroad more than anyone else alive these last 70 years. AND more than ANY Monarch of this country for the last 1000 years.
attributes.background: Officially give this outstanding monarch the OFFICIAL recognition she belatedly deserves.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for a monarch to be given a particular title.
